name: Brad Davis
abstract: Robert Creel "Brad" Davis was an American actor, known for starring in the 1978 film Midnight Express and 1982 film Querelle.
related_searches: Brad Davis and Irene Miracle both appear in Midnight Express.
Brad Davis appears in and Alan Parker directed Midnight Express.
Brad Davis and Bo Hopkins both appear in Midnight Express.
Brad Davis and Günther Kaufmann both appear in Querelle.
